Summary: Drawing of Orb with "tail" seen in Forest Park, IL
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Forest Park
There was one other sighting in Forest Park on or around January 7th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsthis is a quick drawing of the orb i reported on 1\7\12 in forest park, il. i saw this object at 11:25-27 am, cst. it was white, had a straight-line path, emerged west going east. it had a beam or tail (gas emission?) that moved left to right, like a pendulum. the tail was not bright, glowing or reflective like the orb. a jet passed overhead moments earlier in the approximate area of the orb, and the orb seemed well above the jet. the orb was fast, and moved across the sky in approximately half the time it takes for a jet to follow the almost exact route.
